text: Edwin Sherin (January 15, 1930 â€“ May 4, 2017) was an American-Canadian theatre and television director and producer. He has directed many episodes of the television drama Law & Order, as well as directing for the stage, mainly on Broadway, including The Great White Hope, which starred Alexander in both the theater and movie versions. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American stage actors Category:Canadian television directors Category:Canadian television producers Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:People from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania
title: Edwin Sherin
